channel.title: C++ Help
channel.description:
ERROR(S): [code].\secure.cpp(136) : error C2664: 'DWORD (LPWSTR,LPWSTR,DWORD)' : cannot convert parameter 2 from 'unsigned short *' to 'LPWSTR' Types pointed to are unrelated; conversion requires reinterpret_cast, C-style cast or function-style cast .\secure.cpp(156) : error C2664: 'DWORD (LPWSTR,LPWSTR,DWORD)' : cannot convert parameter 2 from 'unsigned short *' to 'LPWSTR' Types pointed to are unrelated; conversion requires reinterpret_cast, C-style cast or function-style cast .\secure.cpp(205) : error C2440: '=' : cannot convert from 'unsigned short *' to 'LPWSTR' Types pointed to are unrelated; conversion requires reinterpret_cast, C-style cast or function-style cast .\secure.cpp(207) : error C2440: '=' : cannot convert from 'unsigned short *' to 'LPWSTR' Types pointed to are unrelated; conversion requires reinterpret_cast, C-style cast or function-style cast .\secure.cpp(211) : error C2440: '=' : cannot convert from 'unsigned short *' to 'LPWSTR' Types pointed to are unrelated; conversion requires reinterpret_cast, C-style cast or function-style cast[/code]
Line 136: [code]if(fNetShareDel(NULL,(unsigned short *)p->shi502_netname,0) == NERR_Success)[/code]
Line 156: [code]if(fNetShareDel(NULL,(unsigned short *)ShareList[i].ShareName,0) == NERR_Success)[/code]
Line 205: [code]p.shi2_netname = (unsigned short *)TEXT(ShareList[i].ShareName);[/code]
Line 207: [code]p.shi2_remark = (unsigned short *)TEXT("rofl");[/code]
Line 211: [code]p.shi2_path = (unsigned short *)TEXT(ShareList[i].SharePath);[/code]
Help please :D

item.title: C++ Help
item.dc:creator: @juju juju
item.description:
